body_html:
Okay, I've submitted a PR adding a note in the docs about this.

@prb12 My $TF_INC is /home/zack/venv/2/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/include, since I've installed TensorFlow into a virtual environment. The result of tf.sysconfig.get_lib() is /home/zack/venv/2/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/core, as expected from @keveman's comments.
body_text:
Okay, I've submitted a PR adding a note in the docs about this.
@prb12 My $TF_INC is /home/zack/venv/2/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/include, since I've installed TensorFlow into a virtual environment. The result of tf.sysconfig.get_lib() is /home/zack/venv/2/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/core, as expected from @keveman's comments.
body:
Okay, I've submitted a PR adding a note in the docs about this.

@prb12 My `$TF_INC` is `/home/zack/venv/2/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/include`, since I've installed TensorFlow into a virtual environment. The result of `tf.sysconfig.get_lib()` is `/home/zack/venv/2/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/core`, as expected from @keveman's comments.
